about.all:
## About LiveStreamRecorder

Stop losing your best content. We record your live streams automatically so you can turn them into short clips and grow your audience.

### Automatic Stream Recording

Just paste your channel URL and go live. We handle the recording — no software to install, nothing to set up. Every stream is saved automatically.

### Rewatch and Download

Finished streaming? Your recording is ready. Watch it back, download it, or send it to your editor.

### ClipAI Finds Your Best Moments

Don't waste hours scrubbing through footage. ClipAI highlights your best moments and turns them into short clips — ready in minutes.

### Grow Your Audience

Turn one live stream into dozens of clips. Share them on TikTok, YouTube Shorts, Instagram Reels, and everywhere else. More content, more views, more followers.

### Record TikTok, Twitch, YouTube, Kick & More

Stream anywhere — we record everywhere. TikTok, Twitch, YouTube, Kick, and more platforms coming soon.

### Free to Start

Create an account and start recording today. Upgrade for higher quality, more recordings, and faster downloads.
about.tiktok:
## About TikTok Stream Recording

Stop losing your TikTok Lives. We record them automatically so you can turn your best moments into clips and grow your following.

### Why Record Your TikTok Lives?

Your Lives are full of great content — funny moments, viewer interactions, viral potential. But once they end, they're gone. We save every Live so you can clip and repost.

### Automatic Recording

Just add your TikTok username and go live. We record automatically — no screen recorder, no phone running all night.

### Rewatch and Download

Finished streaming? Your recording is ready. Watch it back or download it for editing.

### ClipAI Finds Your Best Moments

ClipAI scans your Live and pulls out the highlights. Short clips ready in minutes — just edit and post.

### Grow Your Following

Turn one TikTok Live into multiple clips. Post them as TikToks, Reels, or Shorts. More content = more followers.

### Free to Start

Create an account and start recording your TikTok Lives today.
about.twitch:
## About Twitch Stream Recording

Stop losing your Twitch streams. We record them automatically so you can turn your best moments into clips and grow your channel.

### Why Record Your Twitch Streams?

Twitch VODs expire. Highlights take forever to make. We save every stream automatically — ready to clip and share.

### Automatic Recording

Just add your Twitch channel and go live. We record automatically — no OBS export, no manual saving.

### Rewatch and Download

Finished streaming? Your recording is ready. Watch it back or download it for editing. No more expired VODs.

### ClipAI Finds Your Best Moments

ClipAI scans your stream and pulls out the highlights. Short clips ready in minutes — just edit and post.

### Grow Your Channel

Turn one stream into dozens of clips. Post them on TikTok, YouTube Shorts, Twitter. More clips = more viewers.

### Free to Start

Create an account and start recording your Twitch streams today.
about.youtube:
## About YouTube Stream Recording

Stop losing your YouTube Lives. We record them automatically so you can turn your best moments into Shorts and grow your channel.

### Why Record Your YouTube Lives?

YouTube Lives are great for engagement but hard to repurpose. We save every Live so you can clip the best parts into Shorts.

### Automatic Recording

Just add your YouTube channel and go live. We record automatically — nothing to install, nothing to set up.

### Rewatch and Download

Finished streaming? Your recording is ready. Watch it back or download it for editing.

### ClipAI Finds Your Best Moments

ClipAI scans your Live and pulls out the highlights. Short clips ready in minutes.

### Grow Your Channel

Turn one Live into multiple Shorts. More Shorts = more subscribers.

### Free to Start

Create an account and start recording your YouTube Lives today.
